    S

    saveLeaderboard() - Method in class model.Leaderboard
    saves the player score into the leaderboard .txt file it is called automatically when a score gets added via Leaderboard.addScore(String name, int score)
    SCALE - Static variable in class model.ScreenSettings
    scaling factor of the original tile size (3)
    score - Variable in class model.Leaderboard.LeaderboardEntry
    represents the total points scored by the player
    scoreTracker - Variable in class model.entities.Player
    reference to the ScoreTracker instance
    scoreTracker - Variable in class view.gamePanelViews.ResultScreenView
     
    ScoreTracker - Class in model
    'observer' of the 'Player model, tracks the number of InteractableObject opened, provides card sequence checkers and has various computing utility methods to get the total points.
    ScoreTracker() - Constructor for class model.ScoreTracker
     
    SCREEN_HEIGHT - Static variable in class model.ScreenSettings
    total screen height (in pixels) based on the maximum screen rows * tile size.
    SCREEN_WIDTH - Static variable in class model.ScreenSettings
    total screen width (in pixels) based on the maximum screen cols * tile size.
    ScreenSettings - Class in model
    !VERY! important model, only contains field regarding the game screen size.
    ScreenSettings() - Constructor for class model.ScreenSettings
     
    SEARCH_COMPLETE_TIME - Variable in class model.entities.Player
    time needed to finish a search.
    SEARCH_COMPLETE_TIME - Variable in class model.interactableObjects.InteractableObject
    time to complete the interaction (search) of the interactable object
